import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{loginUser}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('admin');const[password,setPassword]=useState('admin123');const[error,setError]=useState(null);const{login}=useAuth();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError(null);console.log('ðŸ” Iniciando login con:',{username,password:'***'});try{console.log('ðŸ“¤ Llamando a loginUser...');const response=await loginUser(username,password);console.log('âœ… Login response:',response);console.log('ðŸ” Verificando estado de autenticaciÃ³n...');// Verificar el estado de autenticaciÃ³n despuÃ©s del login
